name: IOWork Indonesia
description: IOWork Indonesia is an application company that focuses on creating a new concept of market place which we call "JOB MARKET PLACE" where we gather JOB PROVIDERS and JOB SEEKERS directly on one platform. Job providers and job seekers can exchange information, where job providers can choose their partners directly through the talent pool that we provide, while partners can choose the job you want based on your time flexibility.
features: Opportunity to access nationwide talent pool hassle-free with zero investment
Power to determine your own partner’s fee hourly
business_objectives: Reduce the Cost of Hiring Qualified Employees
Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Headline: Digital Human Capital company with a new "Worket-Place" system which we create a place for company and workers meet!
ShortDescription: IOWork Indonesia is a digital company which focusing on providing talent pool digitally through smartphone applications.
enhanced_description: IOWork Indonesia is a digital job marketplace application designed to directly connect job providers and job seekers on a single platform. It focuses on facilitating the hiring process by providing access to a nationwide talent pool, allowing job providers to digitally select partners and set hourly fees. The platform offers flexibility for job seekers to find work that aligns with their time availability, aiming to reduce hiring costs and boost hiring manager productivity.
key_use_cases: Connecting job providers with job seekers
Digital access to a nationwide talent pool
Hiring talent for roles with hourly fee arrangements
Reducing overall cost of hiring qualified employees
Improving hiring manager efficiency and confidence
competitive_advantages: Hassle-free access to nationwide talent pool with zero upfront investment for job providers
Digital shortening of the hiring process
Ability for job providers to determine partner fees on an hourly basis
Direct platform for job providers and job seekers to exchange information
Focus on time flexibility for job seekers
roi_benefits: Reduced cost of hiring qualified employees
Boosted hiring manager confidence and productivity
Time savings through a shortened digital hiring process
Zero investment required to access the talent pool
primary_users: Job Providers (e.g., HR teams, hiring managers, business owners)
